scripts.pkg-copy: cp smol-auth-core/package.json lib/smol-auth-core && cp smol-auth-express/package.json lib/smol-auth-express && cp smol-auth-client/package.json lib/smol-auth-client
scripts.pkg-install: cd lib/smol-auth-core && pnpm install --prod && npm link && cd ../smol-auth-express && pnpm install --prod && npm link
scripts.start-example:api: cd api-example && npm install && npm link smol-auth-core && npm link smol-auth-express && concurrently "npm run docker:start" "npm run dev"
